name: notebook-to-lib
description: Convert Observable notebooks to standard JavaScript libraries

scripts.demo:watch: chokidar "test-notebooks/**/*.html" "test-notebooks/**/*.package.json" "test-notebooks/**/package.json" --initial -p --poll-interval 200 -d 300 -c "npm run test && npm --prefix test-lib install"
scripts.demo: concurrently -k -n watch,vite "npm run demo:watch" "npm run demo:vite"
